header.title: Will & Estate Management

header.description: Secure your family's future with Sharia-compliant estate planning and digital asset management

about.label: About Us
about.title: Will & Estate Management Solution Provider (WEMSP)
about.description: Our mission is to enhance the quality of life for Muslims by integrating modern technology with traditional values, ensuring that our services align with Shariah principles. Over the years, we have developed a deep understanding of the unique challenges faced by the Muslim community, particularly in areas such as asset management, financial planning, and family governance.

familyManagement.title: Family Management
familyManagement.description: Add your family and kin into the system to easily manage the distribution of your asset.

assetManagement.title: Asset Management
assetManagement.description: Add your asset to make the faraid distribution much easier for the court to organize
